#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<stack>
#include<cstring>
#include<map>
#include<set>
#include<queue>  
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
string s;
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
	int T;
	int n,i,themin,t;
	int lb,lr,lg;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		cin>>s;
		themin=999999;
		lb=lr=lg=-1;
		n=s.size();
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='B')
			{
				lb=i;
				if(lr==-1||lg==-1)
					continue;
				t=min(lr,lg);
				themin=min(themin,i-t+1);
			}
			else if(s[i]=='G')
			{
				lg=i;
				if(lr==-1||lb==-1)
					continue;
				t=min(lr,lb);
				themin=min(themin,i-t+1);
			}
			else
			{
				lr=i;
				if(lb==-1||lg==-1)
					continue;
				t=min(lb,lg);
				themin=min(themin,i-t+1);
			}
		}
		cout<<themin<<endl;
	}
	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
